channel.title: Posts on LD's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on LD's blog

item.title: My first blog post
item.description: If you’re not prepared to be wrong, you’ll never come up with anything original. — Ken Robinson in a Ted Talk Starting this blog as new year resolution!!!!! While building this blogdown website is made so easy with blogdown package, I did have a difficult time setting up ssh for use. Perhaps I should learn the ssh and do it as my second post? I also want to talk about R, vim, building websites as I learn it.
